pageContext.claim: “We will then spend (match or better) the money that China may no longer be spending with our Great Patriot Farmers (Agriculture), which is a small percentage of total Tariffs received, and distribute the food to starving people in nations around the world! GREAT! #MAGA”
pageContext.analysis: This doesn't make any sense. The cost of Trump's tariffs on China is in large part borne by U.S. consumers. In effect, it's a tax, especially on the agricultural sector that relied on large soybean exports to China.
